key_phrases: Acme should be guided by the artists themselves
series of artist in residence grants should be created across all disciplines
non artists administrators ... can learn more about what it takes to be a working musician or painter or poet or dancer
creating a cultural liason or 'caseworker' for each artist
programs designed to help, end up requiring more of the artist than necessary
without any real regard ... of what an artist has to do all ready just to maintain an independant existance
barriers_identified: programs requiring more of the artist than necessary
lack of understanding from non-artist administrators
solutions_proposed: creation of artist-in-residence grants across all disciplines
opportunities for administrators to learn from working artists
creation of a cultural liaison or caseworker for each artist
